q: lawmakers who were in Gabrielle Giffords ' hospital room when she opened her eyes were three of her close female friends in Congress: House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi of California, Nancy Pelosi Debbie Wasserman Schultz , D-Fla., and Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y. The doctors couldn't believe it, Debbie Wasserman Schultz later told CNN. "It was the most incredible experience that I have ever had." Gabrielle Giffords is expected to survive, although her condition and the extent of her recovery remain in doubt.

Anthony Atkinson and Allen Iverson , and Linas Kleiza filled the role Thursday. He got going early, leaking out on the fast break and getting easy layups. He then moved to the outside, going 4-for-8 from 3-point range. He got a couple of easy ones, and once you get a couple of layups, the basket looks bigger, said Allen Iverson , who had 28 points. "He played a great game, and hopefully he can continue to play that way." Linas Kleiza scored 27 points in the first half, 20 in the second quarter

of which are increasingly important given Google Inc. 's global reach. Internally, he will continue to act as an advisor to Larry and Sergey Brin . Commenting on these changes, Eric Schmidt said in the press release: We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. Page said in the press release: " Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google Inc. for the last decade. The results speak for themselves.
